app.name: BLE-20719B2EVB01
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This application group demonstrates BLE protocols and functionality.

Applications included:

  • beacon: Implementation of Google Eddystone and Apple iBeacons
  • hello_sensor and hello_client: BLE Vendor Specific Service and Client
  • env_sensing_temp: BLE Environmental Sensing Service
  • ans and anc: BLE Alert Notification Service and Client
  • bas and bac: BLE Battery Service and Client
  • hrs and hrc: BLE Heart Rate Monitor Service and Client
  • le_coc: BLE Connection Oriented Channel
  • find_me: BLE FindMe Service

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.name: Mesh-Demo-213043MESH
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This application group demonstrates implementation of BLE Mesh Models.

Applications included:

  • color_light: Colored light shows implementation of Light HSL, Hue and Saturation models.
  • dimmer: Implementation of a simple dimmer based on Level Client model.
  • light_dimmable: Implementation of a dimmable light based on the BLE Mesh Light Lightness Server model.
  • light_smart: Implementation of a smart light based on Light Lightness and LC models.
  • low_power_led: Implementation of a low power LED system, includes Low Power Server and Friend Node.
  • on_off_switch: Implementation of a On Off Switch.
  • sensor_hub: Sensor hub app showing implementation of BLE Mesh Sensor Server model.
  • sensor_motion: Motion sensor app showing implementation of BLE Mesh Sensor Server model.
  • sensor_temperature: Temperature sensor app showing implementation of BLE Mesh Sensor Server model.
  • switch_smart: Implementation of a motion sensor combined with the on off button functionality.
  • embedded_provisioner: Demo of a self configured mesh network that includes one node that acts as a provisioner.

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.name: Audio-20719B2EVB01
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This application group demonstrates Bluetooth Audio profiles and functionality.

Applications included:

  • watch: A Smart Watch reference app demonstrating Bluetooth A2DP source, AVRCP Controller/Target, Apple Media Service (AMS) and Apple Notification Center Service (ANCS).
  • audio_gateway: Sample app demonstrating Bluetooth Audio Gateway profile.

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.name: Audio-20721B2EVK03
app.description:

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.name: Audio-20721B2EVK02
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This application group demonstrates Bluetooth Audio profiles and functionality.

Applications included:

  • a2dp_sink: Sample app demonstrating Bluetooth A2DP sink profile.
  • audio_gateway: Sample app demonstrating Bluetooth Audio Gateway profile.
  • btspeaker: A reference app demonstrating Bluetooth speaker.
  • hci_handsfree: Sample app demonstrating Bluetooth Handsfree profile.
  • headset: A reference app demonstrating Bluetooth headset.
  • watch: A Smart Watch reference app demonstrating Bluetooth A2DP source, AVRCP Controller/Target, Apple Media Service (AMS) and Apple Notification Center Service (ANCS).

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This application group demonstrates use of Bluetooth RFCOMM profiles.

Applications included:

  • spp: Sample app demonstrating Serial Port Profile.

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.name: RFCOMM-20719B2EVB01
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This application group demonstrates use of Bluetooth RFCOMM profiles.

Applications included:

  • spp: Sample app demonstrating Serial Port Profile (SPP).
  • spp_multi_port: SPP app that supports 2 connections and interfaces to external host.
  • pbap_client: Sample app demonstrating Phonebook Client Profile.
  • map_client: Sample app demonstrating Message Access Client Profile.
  • opp_server: Sample app demonstrating Object Push Server.

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

  • spp_multi_port: SPP app that supports 2 connections and interfaces to external host.
  • map_client: Sample app demonstrating Message Access Client Profile.

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.name: HID-20819EVB02
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This application group demonstrates Human Interface Devices.

Applications included:

  • ble_keyboard: Turnkey BLE Keyboard solution using on-chip keyscan HW component, based on HID over GATT Profile (HOGP).
  • ble_mouse: BLE Mouse application is a single chip SoC solution based on HID over GATT Profile (HOGP).
  • ble_remote: BLE Remote Control application is a single chip SoC solution based on HID over GATT Profile (HOGP).

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.name: HAL-20719B2EVB01
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This application group demonstrates HAL.

Applications included:

  • gpio: App demonstrates use of WICED GPIO apis to configure GPIOs as input/output.
  • puart: App demonstrates how to use PUART API's to read data over WICED Peripheral UART.
  • adc: App demonstrates how to configure and use ADC to measure DC voltage on DC input channels.
  • i2c_master: App demonstrates how to use I2C interface to send and receive data.
  • uart_raw_mode: App demonstrates how to use the HCI UART in Raw Data Mode.

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.name: HAL-20819EVB02
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This application group demonstrates HAL.

Applications included:

  • low_power: App demonstrates low power modes.
  • gpio: App demonstrates use of WICED GPIO apis to configure GPIOs as input/output.
  • puart: App demonstrates how to use PUART API's to read data over WICED Peripheral UART.
  • pwm: App demonstrates how to configure and use PWM in WICED Eval boards.
  • adc: App demonstrates how to configure and use ADC to measure DC voltage on DC input channels.
  • i2c_master: App demonstrates how to use I2C interface to send and receive data.
  • uart_raw_mode: App demonstrates how to use the HCI UART in Raw Data Mode.

Each app directory has a readme.txt file which provides details of the application and usage.

app.name: Empty-20719B2EVB01
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

This repo contains an empty starter application, a starting point for adding new code and functionality. As provided, the app only outputs a trace message on initialization of the Bluetooth stack.

app.name: wiced_btsdk
app.description:
Note: create wiced_btsdk application first (just once) before creating any other apps.

Do not change the name of this project. BTSDK apps use the project name "wiced_btsdk" in the makefile paths.

This directory contains SDK for BT SDK apps. It includes:

  • baselib: Files for chips such as CYW20819, CYW20719, etc.
  • bsp: Files for BSPs (platforms) supported by BTSDK. For example CYW920721B2EVK-02.
  • btsdk-include: Common header files needed by all apps and libraries.
  • btsdk-tools: Build tools needed by BTSDK.
  • libraries: Profile libraries used by BTSDK apps such as audio, BLE, HID, etc.
  • btsdk-host-apps-bt-ble: Client Control application for BT and BLE embedded apps.
  • btsdk-host-apps-mesh: Client Control application for Mesh embedded apps.
  • btsdk-peer-apps-ble: Peer apps for embedded BLE apps.
  • btsdk-peer-apps-mesh: Peer apps for embedded Mesh apps.
  • btsdk-peer-apps-ota: Peer apps for embedded apps that support Over The Air Firmware Upgrade.
  • btsdk-utils: Utilities used in BTSDK such as BTSpy, wmbt, ecdsa256, etc.
